title: Scientists, TDs call for change in policy on wearing face masks in public
description: Government urged to back measure as new evidence suggests use of basic masks in social settings can prevent spread of Covid-19
content:
Pressure has increased on the Government to require that face masks be worn routinely by the public to contain the Covid-19 virus, in line with a change in scientific opinion in favour of the measure.
Scientists and TDs have called for the change based on in… [+87 chars]
